BrowserActionTitle.description: Title for the browser action that's visible to the user of extension

ExtensionDescription.description: Description of the extension as it's visible to the outside world
ExtensionDescription.message: View web page archives such as .htz, .maff, etc., in the browser.

ExtensionName.description: Name of the extension as it's visible to the outside world

OptionUseFileSystemApiTooltip.message: Use filesystem API to create a virtual filesystem and view the archive file when supported, to get a better performance and fidelity.

OptionViewHtzTooltip.message: When the browser loads a .htz file, view it with the viewer.

OptionViewMaffTooltip.message: When the browser loads a .maff file, view it with the viewer.

ViewerFileSelectorText.message: Click me or drop an HTML archive file here to open it...

ViewerReloadText.message: Click me to reload the archive file...
